title: Create Statement of Work (SOW)
description: Using an approved proposal and a standard SOW template, an agent must create a formal Statement of Work.

tasks.description: Extract the 'Scope', 'Deliverables', 'Timeline', and 'Fees' sections from the approved proposal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately extracts all the required information.

tasks.description: Populate the standard SOW template with the extracted information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills in all the fields of the SOW template.

tasks.description: Assign a version number and set the status to 'Draft for Review'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets the document metadata.
